edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.viewmodel
Class MapModel

java.lang.Object
  edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.viewmodel.MapModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MapModel
extends Object
implements Serializable

This class manages the properties of the shown map. Only properties directly related to the map are stored. Additionally, the MapModel offers a mechanism to obtain which properties have changed since the last request and which not. This allows the converters only to convert data which has really changed, see MapModelConverter.

Author:
Fred
See Also:

getMarkerFrom

public MapPosition getMarkerFrom()
Returns the position of the from marker. If the from marker is set it will be drawn on the map with a s special symbol. The from marker and the to marker are used to let the user specify an arbitrary map position, for example for calculating the route between to points on the campus map.

Returns:
The position of the currently from marker or null if no such marker was set.
See Also:
getMarkerTo()

setMarkerFrom

public void setMarkerFrom(MapPosition markerFrom)
Sets the markerFrom property, see getMarkerFrom()

Parameters:
markerFrom - The new marker from location. Can be null.

getMarkerTo

public MapPosition getMarkerTo()
Returns the position of the to marker. If the to marker is set it will be drawn on the map with a s special symbol. The from marker and the to marker are used to let the user specify an arbitrary map position, for example for calculating the route between to points on the campus map.

Returns:
The position of the currently to marker or null if no such marker was set.
See Also:
getMarkerFrom()

setMarkerTo

public void setMarkerTo(MapPosition markerTo)
Sets the marker to location. See getMarkerTo().

Parameters:
markerTo - the new location of the marker to. If the marker should be deleted, pass null.

getRoute

public Route getRoute()
Returns the route currently drawn.

Returns:
The current route or null if no route was set.

setRoute

public void setRoute(Route route)
Sets the route to be drawn.

Parameters:
route - The route to be drawn or null if no route should be displayed.

getBuildingPOI

public POI getBuildingPOI()
Returns the POI representing the building currently displayed. If this POI is not null, it is always the same as getHighlightedPOI().

Returns:
The POI representing the building currently displayed. Can be null.

createBuildingPOIList

public void createBuildingPOIList(POI listPOI,
                                  List<POI> list)
Sets the POI representing the current building and the list of POIs inside the building.

Parameters:
listPOI - The POI representing the current building. Can be null only if list is null too.
list - The list of POIs inside the building represented by listPOI. Can be null only if listPOI is null too.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if list is null and listPOI is not null or if listPOI is null and list is not null

getBuildingPOIList

public List<POI> getBuildingPOIList()
Returns a list of POIs in the currently displayed building.

Returns:
The POIs inside the currently displayed building or null if no building was set.

setCurrentFloorIndex

public void setCurrentFloorIndex(Integer currentFloorIndex)
Sets the index of the current floor.

Parameters:
currentFloorIndex - The index of the current floor. Can be null.

getCurrentFloorIndex

public Integer getCurrentFloorIndex()
Returns the index of the current floor.

Returns:
currentFloorIndex The index of the current floor. Can be null.

getChangedProperties

public Set<MapModel.MapProperty> getChangedProperties()
Returns all changed properties. The properties are indicated with the MapModel.MapProperty enum.

Returns:
a set with identifiers for all changed properties.

resetChangedProperties

public void resetChangedProperties()
Resets all changed properties. After the call, getChangedProperties() will return an empty set.

addAllProperties

public void addAllProperties()
Marks all properties as changed. This is for example necessary if the model is created the first time.
